com.facebook.buck.cli

Class MainWithNailgun

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.MainWithNailgun

  • public class MainWithNailgun
extends Object
    The Main entry point for Nailgun calls.

    This class maintains the state for statically storing daemon fields

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected BuildId getBuildId() 
      protected MainRunner.KnownRuleTypesFactoryFactory getKnownRuleTypesFactory() 
      static void nailMain(com.facebook.nailgun.NGContext context)
      When running as a daemon in the NailGun server, nailMain(NGContext) is called instead of MainRunner so that the given context can be used to listen for client disconnections and interrupt command processing when they occur.
      protected MainRunner prepareMainRunner(BackgroundTaskManager bgTaskManager)

    • Method Detail

      • nailMain

        public static void nailMain(com.facebook.nailgun.NGContext context)
        When running as a daemon in the NailGun server, nailMain(NGContext) is called instead of MainRunner so that the given context can be used to listen for client disconnections and interrupt command processing when they occur.

      • prepareMainRunner

        protected MainRunner prepareMainRunner(BackgroundTaskManager bgTaskManager)
        Returns:
        an initialized MainRunner for running the buck command, with all the base state setup.

      • getKnownRuleTypesFactory

        protected MainRunner.KnownRuleTypesFactoryFactory getKnownRuleTypesFactory()
        Returns:
        the MainRunner.KnownRuleTypesFactoryFactory for this command

      • getBuildId

        protected BuildId getBuildId()
        Returns:
        the inferred BuildId from the environment variable or create a new random BuildId
